resources.description: Low Carbon Transition Plan changes by energy source

organization.description:
A collection of data about country level energy demand and energy generation technologies to the meet the demand with details of:

- land area required for different energy generation sources
- monetary cost of energy source to develop, implement, maintain and decommission, either by government or industry
- location or suitable location
- energy cost to make and maintain and decommission
- time to develop
- efficiency in cost/unit of energy 
- how efficiency is predicted to change over time
organization.title: Energy Data
organization.name: energy-data

name: low-carbon-transition-plan-for-2020
notes:
The UK Low Carbon Transition Plan plots how the UK will meet the 34 percent cut in emissions on 1990 levels by 2020, set out in the budget. We have already reduced emissions by 21 percent â€“ equivalent to cutting emissions entirely from four cities the size of London.

The changes described in the Transion plan are a selection of additions to the law, investment in techonology and incentive schemes. 

The changes are described by their affect on

- Individuals
- Agrigulture
- Industry
title: UK Low Carbon Transition plan for 2020
